doc.title: May Madham
doc.plot: Sandhya (Sonali Kulkarni) is the only daughter of big shot (Girish Karnad) who always controls her life and schedules her activities. When she finds out he has planned to get her married with an US immigrant, she decides to run away from her family to Madras. Due to some unfortunate events, Sandhya looses her money because of a young chap (Vineeth) and now she is stuck with him until he repays her her cash. As the story unfolds, her family finds her in Madras and love blossoms between the two.
